channel.title: Fedora on LoopedNetwork
channel.description: Recent content in Fedora on LoopedNetwork

item.title: Fedora 38 Release
item.description: I saw on Mastodon earlier today that Fedora 38 was released. I had checked several weeks ago on when it was expected, and while I knew it was going to be soon, it had fallen off my radar while I’ve been preoccupied with a few other things. While I tend to be a bit more cautious with my work machines, on my personal machines I typically pull the trigger on major new OS releases with a fairly cavalier attitude, so as soon as I had a moment I went to get the upgrade rolling.
